Caption: A high tea ceremony, that was thrown in honour of Mr. Hans Lenz’s (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany) visit to IIT Madras, in progress
Description: On 30th January, 1964 Mr. Hans Lenz (Minister for Scientific Research, Federal Republic of Germany, Bonn) visited IIT Madras. A high tea ceremony was thrown in honour of his visit to the campus. The Minister spent the evening conversing with the dignitaries, administrative staff and faculty members who were present and the entire event was nothing short of an elegant and formal affair. The ceremony was held outdoors under the natural shade of the tree canopies. In the image, the dignitaries indulge in refreshments at the high tea event that was thrown in honour of Mr. Hans Lenz’s visit to IIT Madras.
